name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.max.connections
description:
Max allowed connections for the shuffle.  Set to 0 (zero)
               to indicate no limit on the number of connections.

name: dfs.namenode.max-num-blocks-to-log
description:
Puts a limit on the number of blocks printed to the log by the Namenode
    after a block report.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.queue.limit
description:
Storage policy satisfier queue size. This queue contains the currently
    scheduled file's inode ID for statisfy the policy.
    Default value is 1000.

name: dfs.namenode.redundancy.interval.seconds
description:
The periodicity in seconds with which the namenode computes 
  low redundancy work for datanodes. Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive),
  as described in dfs.heartbeat.interval.

name: dfs.client.server-defaults.validity.period.ms
description:
The amount of milliseconds after which cached server defaults are updated.

    By default this parameter is set to 1 hour.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.

name: dfs.bytes-per-checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  dfs.stream-buffer-size

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.
